scripts.postgenerate: rimraf .openapi-generator-ignore && rimraf .gitignore && rimraf .openapi-generator && rimraf openapitools.json && rimraf gradle && rimraf .travis.yml && rimraf build.gradle  && rimraf build.sbt && rimraf git_push.sh && rimraf gradle.properties && rimraf gradlew && rimraf gradlew.bat && rimraf settings.gradle && rimraf api
scripts.delete: npm run clean && rimraf src && rimraf pom.xml && rimraf docs && rimraf README.md
